column2: "Afei nna Elisha aka akyerɛ ɔbaa no a onyaan ne ba ma ɔbaa nkwa mu no
column3: dɛ
column5: na ɔwo na wo fiemba nkɔ
column6: na kɛyɛ ɔhɔho wɔ beebiara a ibotum ayɛ ɔhɔho no: osiandɛ EWURADZE afrɛ ɔkɔm; na ɔbɛba asaase no do mfe esuon."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no soɛree
column3: na ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Nyame nyimpa no n’asɛm no tse: na ɔnye ne fiefo sii mu kɔree
column4: na ɔkɛyɛɛ ɔhɔho wɔ Filistiafo asaase do mfe esuon."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ mfe esuon no n’ewiei no
column3: nna ɔbaa no fii Filistiafo asaase do sanee bae: na ɔkɔree kosui tɔɔ ɔhen no do dɛ ɔregye ne fie na n’asaase."

column2: "Aber no nna ɔhen no nye Nyame nyimpa no n’akowaa Gehazi rekasa
column3: dɛ
column5: ka ndzɛmba akɛseakɛse a Elisha ayɛ no nyinara kyerɛ me."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ɔreka mbrɛ osii nyaan nyia owui ma ɔbaa nkwa mu no rekyerɛ ɔhen no
column6: ɔbaa no a onyaan ne ba ma ɔbaa nkwa mu no
column7: sui tɔɔ ɔhen no do dɛ ɔregye ne fi na n’asaase no. Na Gehazi see dɛ
column11: na ne ba a Elisha nyaan no ma ɔbaa nkwa mu no so nye yi."

column2: "Na aber a ɔhen no bisaa ɔbaa no no
column3: ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no. Nna ɔhen no yii ɔhwɛdofo bi maa no
column6: na haban mu nduadzewa nyinara a ofi da a ogyaa asaase yi dze bodu sesei no ma no."

column2: "Na Elisha baa Damaskɔs; na Siriahen Ben-hadad yar; na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column3: Nyame nyimpa no aba ha."

column2: "Na ɔhen no see Hazael dɛ
column3: Fa akyɛdze kitsa wo nsamu
column4: na kɔ kehyia Nyame nyimpa no
column5: na kodua no do bisa EWURADZE hɔ adze
column7: Ana mobɔbɔ esu wɔ yarba yi mu a?"

column2: "Nna Hazael sii mu kɔree kehyiaa no
column3: na ɔfaa akyɛdze kitsae
column4: mekyerɛ Damaskɔs adze pa biara mu bi
column6: na ɔbae begyinaa n’enyim see dɛ
column8: na ɔsomaa me wɔ wo nkyɛn
column10: Ana mobɔbɔ esu wɔ yarba yi mu a?"

column2: "Na Elisha see no dɛ
column3: Kɔ
column5: Esu dze ebɔbɔ ampa; naaso EWURADZE eyi akyerɛ me dɛ owu ara na obowu."

column2: "Na ɔdze n’enyi tsiim no do hann kodur dɛ ɔyɛɛ no ahomtsew: na Nyame nyimpa no sui."
"Na Hazael see dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mo wura rusu yi? Na obuaa dɛ
column4: Osiandɛ minyim mbusu a edze bɔbɔ Israelmba: ebɔtoto hɔn akoban mu gya
column5: na edze afona bokuku hɔn mberantsɛ
column6: na abobɔ hɔn nkɔkowaba egu famu

column2: "Na Hazael see dɛ
column3: Na w’akowaa nye woana
column5: dɛ ɔbɛyɛ adze kɛse yi? Na Elisha buaa dɛ
column6: EWURADZE eyi akyerɛ me dɛ ɔwoara na ebɛyɛ Siria do hen."

column2: "Nna ofii Elisha nkyɛn sii mu kɔree na ɔbaa no wura nkyɛn; na obisaa no dɛ
column3: Na Elisha see wo dɛn? Na obuaa dɛ

column2: "Naaso ɔbaa dɛ n’adzekyee no
column3: Hazael faa mpadotam no bɔɔ nsu mu dze kataa n’enyim
column4: ma owui: na odzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Na Israelhen Ahab ne ba Joram n’afe a otsia enum no mu
column3: aber no a Jehosafat dzii Judahen no
column4: Judahen Jehosafat ne ba Jehoram hyɛɛ ase dzii hen."

column2: "Aber a ɔhyɛɛ ase dzii hen no nna oedzi mfe eduasa ebien; na odzii hen mfe awɔtwe wɔ Jerusalɛm."
"Na ɔnantseew Israel ahemfo kwan do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Ahab fie yɛe no: osiandɛ onyaa Ahab ne babaa yɛɛ ne yer: na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do."

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE ammpɛ dɛ ɔsɛɛ Juda
column3: osian n’akowaa David ntsi
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔɔ no anohoba dɛ ɔbɛyɛ ɔno na n’asefo kandzea afebɔɔ no."

column2: "Ne nda mu na Edom tseew etua fii Juda ne nsaadze
column3: na wɔkɛhyɛɛ hɔnara hɔn do hen."

column2: "Nna Joram twaa mu kɔr Zair
column3: na ne ntseaseanam nyinara ka no ho: na ɔsoɛɛr anadwe
column4: na okunkum Edomfo a woetwa no ho ehyia
column5: na ntseaseanam do asafohemfo no: na nkorɔfo no guanguanee kɔr hɔn asesee mu."

column2: "Nna Edom tseew etua fii Juda ne nsaadze
column3: dze bodu ndɛ da yi. Nna Libna so tseew etua mber no ara mu."

column2: "Na Joram ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn mber do nsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Joram kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no kaa n’egyanom ho wɔ David kurow mu: na ne ba Ahazia dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Israelhen Ahab ne ba Joram n’afe a otsia duebien no mu
column3: na Judahen Jehoram ne ba Ahazia hyɛɛ ase dzii hen."

column2: "Aber a Ahazia hyɛɛ ase dzii hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu ebien: na odzii hen afrenhyia wɔ Jerusalɛm. Na ne na ne dzin dze Atalia
column3: Israelhen Omri ne nanaba a."

column2: "Na ɔnantseew Ahab fi kwan do
column3: na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Ahab fi yɛe no: osiandɛ ɔyɛ asew wɔ Ahab fie."

column2: "Na ɔnye Ahab ne ba Joram tuu sa wɔ Siriahen Hazael do wɔ Ramot-gilead: na Siriafo no piraa Joram."

"Na ɔhen Joram sanee baa Jezreel dɛ ɔrebɛyɛ n’epirakur a onyaa no wɔ Rama wɔ aber a ɔnye Siriahen Hazael roko no edur. Na Judahen Jehoram ne ba Ahazia sii mu kɔr dɛ ɔrokɔhwɛ Ahab ne ba Joram wɔ Jezreel
column3: osiandɛ ɔyar."
